rules.name: myRule_6
rules.label: Case is Customer Support and Account has just changed?

rules.name: myRule_9
rules.label: Case has tax Free Form and no Contact?

Flow.description: This Process fires when a case record is created or edited

value.stringValue: AND(ISCHANGED([Case].Status ), TEXT([Case].Status) = 'Escalated 2nd Line Support', OR([Case].Owner:User.Country = 'Germany', [Case].Owner:Queue.Name = 'POS Support DE'))
AND(ISCHANGED([Case].Status ), TEXT([Case].Status) = 'Escalated 2nd Line Support', OR([Case].Owner:User.Country = 'United Kingdom', [Case].Owner:Queue.Name = 'POS Support GB'))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_17
formulas.expression: AND(ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status} ), TEXT({!myVariable_current.Status}) = 'Escalated 2nd Line Support', OR({!myVariable_current.Owner:User.Country} = 'United Kingdom', {!myVariable_current.Owner:Queue.Name} = 'POS Support GB'))

value.stringValue: AND(ISCHANGED([Case].Status ), TEXT([Case].Status) = 'Escalated 2nd Line Support', OR([Case].Owner:User.Country = 'Italy', [Case].Owner:Queue.Name = 'POS Support Italy'))

Flow.label: Case - On Create & Edit

recordUpdates.name: myRule_15_A2
recordUpdates.label: Set Owner to POS 2nd Line Support DE

recordUpdates.name: myRule_17_A2
recordUpdates.label: Set Owner to POS 2nd Line Support GB

recordUpdates.name: myRule_19_A2
recordUpdates.label: Set Owner to POS 2nd Line Support IT
